comments_since_last_sample.body: If say the truth,  I will be marked,  but basically.  Real men sat silent as filthy perverted demonicly influenced peoples and groups dismantled social structures and institutions.  Women sought to be manly, men became infemanent. Now girls ARE boys and boys ArE girls And some are neither,  Some are Fire demons from imaginary places. In short. Mankind overthrew God.
"...not a single man on that train intervened." Being that he hit her and walked away, you mean "Not a single man on that train beat him up for her"?
"experts" - gender, climate, health.... dont you really see where all this is going if you let this to continue?

I've known a few men that were considered Good fathers. A dog wouldn't want their lives I surely didn't. I pitied them.I don't regret leaving  I wish I'd been able to have more influence on my children. I believe they and the world would have been better off.
You have to come to where the rubber meets the road....to see men..
Most of them turned themselves into women....
